name: Network Reconnaissance Activity
description: Detects a set of suspicious network related commands often used in recon stages
false_positives: False positives depend on scripts and administrative tools used in the monitored environment
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:*nslookup* AND process.command_line:*_ldap._tcp.dc._msdcs.*)`
